message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product! Considering its value and quality, I'm offering it to you for a special price of...
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Thanks, Bob! I appreciate your interest. I can't quite go down to $120, but how about we meet in the middle at...
Hi Alice, I appreciate the compromise, but I was thinking we could meet a bit closer to my original offer. How about $125?
Thanks, Bob! I'm getting closer. How about...
Hi Alice, I think we're really close now. I'm willing to meet you almost all the way. How about $126?
